main event: A UFO was reported by a witness in Gaithersburg, Maryland on 6 September 1953. The object appeared disk-shaped, moved from east to west, and seemed to bounce or waver. It was about the size of a baseball, made no sound, and had no observed exhaust. The observation lasted approximately 7 minutes before the object disappeared over the horizon.
interesting points: The witness reported a UFO of approximately disk-shaped with a bouncing or wavering movement.
The UFO was about the size of a baseball and made no sound or exhaust.
The object traveled from east to west and disappeared over the horizon with a red-ish orange appearance.
The observation lasted around 7 minutes, and no optical aid was used by the observer.
Clear moonlight and no clouds were reported during the observation.
